casebody.data:
No. 09-10108. Montgomery Carl Akers, Petitioner v. Sam A. Crow, Judge, United States District Court for the District of Kansas, et al. 560 U.S. 915, 130 S. Ct. 3302,

176 L. Ed. 2d 1203,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 3987. May 17, 2010.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 343 Fed. Appx. 319.
